title: Aroma Natural Happiness Essential Oil Blend 15mL

cleaned_text: A fresh, vibrant blend of pure essential oils to assist with promoting emotional wellbeing, contentment and joy. INGREDIENTS: Bergamot, Vanilla, Lemon Myrtle, Sweet Orange, Patchouli, Marjoram, Jasmine. Recommended dosage for Diffuser/Oil Burners 3-4 drops. Keep out of reach of children. Not to be taken orally. Not recommended for infants/toddlers or pregnant women. Store below 30 degrees C. ALWAYS MADE IN AUSTRALIA INGREDIENTS: Bergamot, Vanilla, Lemon Myrtle, Sweet Orange, Patchouli, Marjoram, Jasmine.
